item.title: Vanhackaton status 2
item.description: Today was a very productive day!! tons of nice features add to the editor: Converted all the javascript code to run inside an Angular application Create the UI to edit the questions, with add and remove Created the timeline that shows each question position in the video Created backend using node.js and SQLLite Add inline edit to the story title and questions Scroll to the question when clicks on the timeline marker Monitor the execution of the video and pause for the question, tracking the answer in the edit mode Getting close to the first usable version!
